payload.description: Create image upload endpoint POST /api/quests/:questId/curriculum/images in backend/routes/curriculum.py. Upload to Supabase storage, resize to max 2000px width, return public URL. Use curriculum_service for storage logic.
payload.context: Accept multipart/form-data image upload. Store in Supabase storage bucket 'curriculum-images' with path quests/{questId}/images/{filename}. Resize with PIL if needed. Return {url: 'public_url'}. Check file type (jpg, png, gif, webp) and size limit (25MB).
